price: Dan tentu mereka akan mengatakan (pula), "Hidup hanyalah kehidupan kita di dunia ini saja, dan kita sekali-sekali tidak akan dibangkitkan467".
arabic: وَقَالُوٓاْ إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَبۡعُوثِينَ
footnotes: 467.  Maksudnya, jika mereka dikembalikan ke dunia, mereka akan mengatakan demikian.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqālū in hiya illā ḥayātunā al-dun'yā wamā naḥnu bimabʿūthīna
